TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that a crash records can be validated from batch operation screen
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is to click on filter icon
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click filter icon.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click filter icon.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter crash ref no.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter crash ref no.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to crash ref no.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on search button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on search button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on search button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Select the checkbox against the crash record.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select the checkbox.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select the checkbox.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select the checkbox.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click validate button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click validate button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click validate button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify the number of valid records.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify the number of valid records.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify the number of valid records.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify the number of valid records.
